instructions: Beat butter until smooth and creamy.  Add eggs and beat until incorporated.  Add vanilla, pumpkin, and sugar and beat until well blended.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and spices.
Add the dry ingredients to the liquid mixture until just moistened.  Do not over mix.
Fold in the chocolate chips and/or walnuts
Fill the muffin cups 2/3 full.  Bake at 400 for 18 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
